about_the_game:
The gaze behind one's body, the malicious gaze, and the hat that greatly changes one's temperament are full of doubts and confusion. "Did you pee today?" seemed like a greeting, but secretly revealed an unknown secret

TOiLET! Exploring the hidden rules of using the restroom in the midst of joyful hustle and bustle, strategizing, meticulous, and meticulous, is the key to truly experiencing the exhilaration.

Let's go to the toilet and go make fun of it!
detailed_description:
The gaze behind one's body, the malicious gaze, and the hat that greatly changes one's temperament are full of doubts and confusion. "Did you pee today?" seemed like a greeting, but secretly revealed an unknown secret

TOiLET! Exploring the hidden rules of using the restroom in the midst of joyful hustle and bustle, strategizing, meticulous, and meticulous, is the key to truly experiencing the exhilaration.

Let's go to the toilet and go make fun of it!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: CentOS 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon R7 240
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: CentOS 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon R7 240
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: TOiLET Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon R7 240
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon R7 240
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Go to the toilet, one must also strategize.
